text:
Hi All,
I want to fetch all the contacts based on the *updatedAt* filter. Please let me know what the will be the curl command for the same?
I have tried the below URL but its not working:
<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts/?properties=email,phone,firstname,lastname,id,updatedAt&filter> = updatedAt > 1725168027000

Hey all,
I'm trying to find the endpoint for to get contact lists through API.

I only found the legacy endpoint here
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/lists/get_lists>

I can't find any endpoint for this in the new one.
My aim is to do a get request to get the all the lists that a specific contact is member of.
